token_not_found.message: Token bulunamadı! Lütfen Discord sayfasını açtıktan sonra tekrar deneyiniz.
token_not_found.description: Displayed when the token is missing.

welcome_global_name.description: A text that prefixes the global name

welcome_username.description: A text that prefixes the username.

welcome_policy_text.message: 'Devam Et' butonuna tıklayarak Discord MesDel uygulamasının tokenimi kullanmasına izin veriyor, tokenimin güvenliğinden benim sorumlu olduğumu ve uygulama kullanımım süresince oluşabilecek sorunları kabul ettiğimi onaylıyorum.
welcome_policy_text.description: Message informing the user about the terms and privacy policy.

welcome_continue_button.description: Text for the 'Continue' button on the welcome screen.

dashboard_title.description: Title displayed on the dashboard screen.

dashboard_search_box_placeholder.description: Placeholder text for the search box on the dashboard.

dashboard_donate_button.description: Allows you to donate to developers

dashboard_translate_button.description: You can translate the application into your own language.

channels_loading_text.description: A message is displayed until the channels are listed.

no_channels_found.description: A message is displayed when no channels found.

logout_button_text.description: Text for the 'Logout' button on the dashboard.

no_user_found.description: A message is displayed when no user found.

logout_modal_title.description: Title for the logout confirmation modal.

logout_modal_text.message: Eklentiden tamamen çıkış yapmak istediğinize emin misiniz, Tüm bilgileriniz silenecektir?
logout_modal_text.description: Message asking for confirmation to log out.

deletion_modal_title.description: A title for message deletion modal.

deletion_modal_count_text.description: Text for the 'Delete' button in the deletion modal.

deletion_modal_delete_button.description: Text for the 'Delete' button in the deletion modal.

close_modal_button.description: Text for the button to close a modal.

deletion_progression_completed_text.description: Message displayed when the deletion process is complete.

deletion_progression_text.description: Message deletion percentage is displayed progression screen.

no_channel_found.description: Displayed when no channels are found during a search.

deletion_completed_push_notification_tex.message: Silme işlemi tamamlandı. $MESSAGE_COUNT$ mesaj başarıyla uzaya fırlatıldı!
deletion_completed_push_notification_tex.description: Push notification displayed when deletion is successfully completed.
